testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real stories from people who found support with Vina

sarah.name: Sarah Chen
sarah.text: Vina has been a game-changer for my mental health. The AI conversations feel so natural and supportive.

mike.name: Mike Rodriguez
mike.text: I love how Vina is always available when I need someone to talk to. It's like having a supportive friend 24/7.

emma.name: Emma Thompson
emma.text: The privacy and security features give me peace of mind. I can be completely honest without any judgment.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Wellness Journey?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users who have found support, understanding, and growth with Vina.

team.title: Meet the Big Brain Behind Vina
team.subtitle: The Visionaries
team.description: Meet the brilliant minds behind Vina - a diverse team of innovators, mental health experts, and technology pioneers working together to revolutionize accessible mental healthcare.
team.joinDescription: We're always looking for passionate individuals who want to make a difference in mental healthcare. Join our team and help us build the future of accessible therapy.

sarah.name: Prince Igwe
sarah.description: Versatile backend architect with expertise in real-time systems and AI programming, with a passion for scalable, secure digital health platforms.

james.name: James Asaolu
james.description: Passionate and self-motivated frontend engineer with good eye for pixel perfect design and thirst for reliable and impactful systems.

therapist.title: Connect with
therapist.description: Get personalized support from qualified mental health professionals through secure video calls and real-time messaging.

videoSessions.title: HD Video Sessions
videoSessions.description: High-definition video calls with professional therapists in a secure, private environment designed for comfort and confidentiality.

messaging.title: 24/7 Messaging
messaging.description: Continuous support through secure messaging with your assigned therapist, available whenever you need guidance.

licensed.title: Licensed Professionals
licensed.description: Connect with qualified, licensed therapists who specialize in various areas of mental health and wellness.

hipaa.title: HIPAA Compliant
hipaa.description: End-to-end encryption and HIPAA compliance ensure your conversations remain completely confidential and secure.

messages.therapist1: Good morning! How are you feeling today?
messages.user1: I've been feeling anxious about work lately. The pressure has been overwhelming.
messages.therapist2: I understand. Let's work through this together. Can you tell me more about what's causing the anxiety?
messages.user2: I think it's the deadlines and feeling like I'm not doing enough. Plus, I haven't been sleeping well...
messages.therapist3: That sounds really tough. Sleep is so important for our mental health. Have you tried any relaxation techniques before bed? I'd love to help you find some strategies that work for you. üíô

videoCall.title: Experience Professional Video Therapy
videoCall.subtitle: Connect face-to-face with licensed therapists through our secure, HD video platform

hdVideo.title: HD Video Quality
hdVideo.description: Crystal clear video calls with professional-grade audio for the best therapy experience

secure.title: End-to-End Encryption
secure.description: Your video sessions are fully encrypted and HIPAA compliant for maximum privacy

scheduling.title: Flexible Scheduling
scheduling.description: Book sessions that fit your schedule with easy rescheduling and cancellation options

videoCallFlow.title: How Video Therapy Works
videoCallFlow.subtitle: Experience the complete journey from therapist selection to your secure video session

step1.title: Choose Your Therapist
step1.description: Browse our network of licensed professionals and find the perfect match for your needs

step2.title: Schedule Your Session
step2.description: Pick a time that works for you from available slots in your therapist's calendar

step3.title: Pre-Session Setup
step3.description: Complete a quick technical check and review your session goals before connecting

step4.title: Start Your Session
step4.description: Connect securely with your therapist in a private, encrypted video environment

cta.description: Join thousands of users who have found support through our platform

work.title: Work Stress
work.description: Dealing with work pressure and deadlines

messages.ai1: Hello! I'm here to listen and support you. How are you feeling today? üåü
messages.user1: Hi Vina, I've been feeling a bit overwhelmed lately with work and everything...
messages.ai2: I hear you, and it's completely normal to feel that way. Work stress can really take a toll. What specifically has been the most challenging for you lately?
messages.user2: I think it's the deadlines and feeling like I'm not doing enough. Plus, I haven't been sleeping well...
messages.ai3: That sounds really tough. Sleep is so important for our mental health. Have you tried any relaxation techniques before bed? I'd love to help you find some strategies that work for you. üíô

messages.ai1: Good morning! How did you sleep last night? üòä
messages.user1: Actually, I had a really good night's sleep for the first time in weeks!
messages.ai2: That's wonderful to hear! What do you think helped you sleep better?
messages.user2: I tried the breathing exercises you suggested. They really helped calm my mind.
messages.ai3: I'm so glad those worked for you! Consistency is key. Would you like to explore some other relaxation techniques? üå∏

messages.ai1: Hi there! I noticed you've been quiet today. Everything okay? ü§ó
messages.user1: I'm just feeling a bit down. Nothing specific, just one of those days.
messages.ai2: Those days are completely normal and valid. Sometimes we just need to acknowledge our feelings without trying to fix them. How about we just chat about whatever comes to mind?
messages.user2: That sounds nice. Maybe I just need someone to talk to without any pressure.
messages.ai3: Exactly! I'm here for exactly that. No pressure, no judgment, just a listening ear. What's on your mind? üí≠
